Sentencas: Microwave sintering is a very interesting subject, which provides an alternative method to overcome problems faced with conventional sintering.
Titulo: Microwave Sintered Nanocomposite Electrodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This process is very efficient and only requires a few minutes.
Titulo: Microwave Sintered Nanocomposite Electrodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this paper, nanocomposite electrodes (Cu0.15Ni0.85-GDC) were sintered at 700 degrees C for 10 mins in a single mode 2.45 GHz microwave oven by the solid state reaction method.
Titulo: Microwave Sintered Nanocomposite Electrodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The composition influence and the sintering methods on the as-obtained powder were characterized by XRD, SEM and TEM.
Titulo: Microwave Sintered Nanocomposite Electrodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: It was observed that excellent sintering took place.
Titulo: Microwave Sintered Nanocomposite Electrodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Excellent fuel cell performance was achieved with microwave sintering compared to samples sintered using conventional sintering.
Titulo: Microwave Sintered Nanocomposite Electrodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Electrochemical analysis was carried out using AC Impedance technique.
Titulo: Microwave Sintered Nanocomposite Electrodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This paper reports a new approach to develop a microwave sintered based nanocomposite material, which is more efficient on time and energy.

Sentencas: This method can gain significant economical benefits compared to conventional sintered materials for applications in low temperature solid oxide fuel cells (LTSOFC).
